content:
Hi,

I have been trying to use isabelle server to programmatically check theories, but I noticed timings of ~20s for even quite small ones. In comparison Isabelle/jEdit takes less than 4s for the same theory (including loading up the base session heap).

What could be the source of the difference? I believe they are both built on top of the PIDE framework. Is there some option/flag I should be looking into?
